page.title: 08***Somerby Play school*****.
page.content:
My Mum helps at play school, which is held in the chapel school room.There are about 25 to 30 children from 3years to 4years.It is on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday from 9o'clock to 12.30. First Mum and the playgroup leader put out the toys. The children play with them until milk time and biscuits.Most Mums leave but some stay.After milk time they make things from boxes and paper, or they paint. Several times a year they have outings. They have just been to Wicksteed Park in Kettering.
Written by Ruth Ward aged 9yrs.
